system.requirements:
Tier 2; Weapon Skill 40, Willpower 40
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Offence
system.effect: When a Character, Comrade, or Allied NPC is killed within 50 metres by an enemy, the character adds +3 to all damage dealt with Righteous Fury until the end of the Encounter.

description.value: When a Character, Comrade, or Allied NPC is killed within 50 metres by an enemy, the character adds +3 to all damage dealt with Righteous Fury until the end of the Encounter.
